description:
We believe that every working Australian has the right to a happy retirement.

We are united in our purpose: to create value for members, and we want you to join us on this journey.

Our goal is to make sure that our more than 2.2 million members are put first in everything we do. We work hard to minimise cost and to generate strong, long-term investment performance. What makes us different is that we genuinely care. After all, our colleagues, our friends and our families are members.

​

We are leaders in the superannuation industry with more than $120 billion in member’s retirement savings invested around the world. Our challenge is to build on our award winning performance, and make the most of the growth in our economy and in overseas markets beyond.

We want to attract and develop great people to do this, and to continually:

  • Lead in performance, and grow from local to global,
  • Maintain the trust of members and shape the industry for the better,
  • Build and offer new ways for members to boost their income in retirement.

At AustralianSuper, we make it our business to invest in our people, to develop a diverse workforce and to never stop improving and growing. Together we’re going from strength to strength.
